==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|たい|くん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=たいくん}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|た|いくん}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ta̠ikɯ̃ᵝɴ]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たいくん}}

# the [[wearing]] of an official [[order]] or [[decoration]]
# the [[state]] of having been awarded an official [[order]] or [[decoration]], such as the [[Order of Merit]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-l|帯勲有位|たいくんゆうい|taikun yūi}}: the [[status]] of having an official [[order]] or [[decoration]]

====See also====
* {{ja-l|勲章|くんしょう|kunshō}}: an [[order]] or [[decoration]] awarded for [[meritorious]] [[service]] or for a [[distinguished]] [[deed]]
